title: atFoliX Screen Protector Compatible with Nubia Red Magic 7 Pro Protector Film, Ultra Clear and Flexible FX Screen Protection Film (3X)
features: Full-area protection - the Protector Film covers the display to the edge - especially for curved screens

Flexible, shock-absorbing, best touch&feel, easy installation - all the way to the edge. The FX-ActiFleX Protector Film compatible with Nubia Red Magic 7 Pro combines almost all positive properties in one product.
Originating from our proven FX-Curved-Clear, this Screen Protector surpasses its predecessor in many respects: Independent disappearance of air bubbles (48-72 h) and easy installation guaranteed
Highest adhesion on curved glass and ceramic surfaces. Shock-absorbing (anti-shock) - Oleophobic coating against fingerprints - Crystal-clear surface

Accessory@FoliX - Made in Germany *** Self-healing material: minor injuries close on their own. Even an injured adhesive layer "flows" back into its original form after some time.. Strongest edge adhesion - the Screen Protection Film protects the display almost 100%. Can be mounted bubble-free by dry mounting. Residue-free removable
description: FX-ActiFleX Screen Protector from atFoliX, ideal for curved displays, compatible with Nubia Red Magic 7 ProThe best Screen Protector we've ever developed:- highest smoothness- highest adhesion to glass and ceramics (not suitable for plastic surfaces)- Anti-Shock: shock absorbing- anti-fingerprint coating- best look&feel for a glassy touch experience- self-healing surface and adhesive layer- dry mountable and repositionable- air bubbles disappear after 48-72 hours on their ownStrongest adhesion on surfaces and roundingsThis flexible premium film is especially suitable for curved displays and ideally suited where particularly high display sharpness and maximum protection are required.Shock-absorbing and self-healingScreen Protector made of tough and energy-absorbing TPU. The material helps to protect the glass surface of your device against impacting objects. Superficial injuries close automatically after some time.Anti-FingerprintDue to the oleophobic coating fingerprints hardly stick. The hard surface makes touch screen operation fluid and easy. "Glass feeling" included.AssemblabilityCan easily be mounted and repositioned due to dry mounting. Bubbles and mounting marks disappear after 48-72 hours. Residue-free removal.Full-area protection - rounded displays are covered by the FX-ActiFleX Screen Protector up to the device edge. This ensures safety for the sensitive glass edge.Scope of delivery- 3 x FX-ActiFleX Protector Film compatible with Nubia Red Magic 7 Pro- cleaning cloth- installation tool (squeegee)- Link to the multilingual, illustrated mounting instructions (including mounting video)Packages for devices with several screens (e.g. internal and external screens) contain a protective film for each screen.
